summary: "Hancock" is a 2008 American funny superhero movie starring Will Smith. He plays a superhero who has lost his memory and loves drinking. The film is about him trying to remember his past. It's directed by Peter Berg and written by Vince Gilligan and Vy Vincent Ngo. Other stars include Charlize Theron and Jason Bateman. The movie took a long time to make and had many directors interested. It was finally filmed in Los Angeles. Though critics had mixed feelings, the movie made a lot of money worldwide.
title: Hancock (film)
